data.name: Starbrand
data.description: The first human to wield the intergalactic power of the Star Brand, Vnn saved the world of 10,000 BC as a member of a prehistoric group of Avengers.

starItems.name: Starbrand
starItems.description: The first human to wield the intergalactic power of the Star Brand, Vnn saved the world of 10,000 BC as a member of a prehistoric group of Avengers.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>325%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all attacks
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally for primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all attacks
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>275%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all attacks
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

Attack the enemy with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>325%</color> damage, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip all positive effects into negative effects for primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and flip all positive effects into negative effects.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the most injured enemy

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and flip all positive effects into negative effects.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage.

Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and flip all positive effects into negative effects.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
1.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, lower the Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
<color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> and Black Panther (1MM) ally.
 > Lower the Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
